body_html:
I had this same problem when building Tensorflow 0.9.0. The Eigen dependency that 0.9.0 uses includes this issue. It's fixed just three commits later: https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/commits/e934860fa7bc

Updating bazel to use the newer version of Eigen above worked for me. This problem also may be solved when building a more recent version of Tensorflow, but I wanted to save a couple hours of time for anyone else in my position.

body:
I had this same problem when building Tensorflow 0.9.0. The Eigen dependency that 0.9.0 uses includes this issue. It's fixed just three commits later: https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/commits/e934860fa7bc

 Updating bazel to use the newer version of Eigen above worked for me. This problem also may be solved when building a more recent version of Tensorflow, but I wanted to save a couple hours of time for anyone else in my position.
